com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models

Class AcquireLeaseOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.BlobServiceOptions
      • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.AcquireLeaseOptions

  • public class AcquireLeaseOptions
extends BlobServiceOptions
    Represents the options that may be set on an acquireLease request. These options include an optional server timeout for the operation and any access conditions for the operation.

    • Method Detail

      • setTimeout

        public AcquireLeaseOptions setTimeout(java.lang.Integer timeout)
        Sets the optional server request timeout value associated with this AcquireLeaseOptions instance.

        The timeout value only affects calls made on methods where this AcquireLeaseOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Overrides:
        setTimeout in class BlobServiceOptions
        Parameters:
        timeout - The server request timeout value to set in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        A reference to this AcquireLeaseOptions instance.

      • getAccessCondition

        public AccessConditionHeader getAccessCondition()
        Gets the access conditions set in this AcquireLeaseOptions instance.
        Returns:
        An AccessCondition containing the access conditions set, if any.

      • setAccessCondition

        public AcquireLeaseOptions setAccessCondition(AccessConditionHeader accessCondition)
        Sets the access conditions for acquiring a lease on a blob. By default, the operation will acquire the lease unconditionally. Use this method to specify conditions on the ETag or last modified time value for performing the operation.

        The accessCondition value only affects calls made on methods where this AcquireLeaseOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        accessCondition - An AccessCondition containing the access conditions to set.
        Returns:
        A reference to this AcquireLeaseOptions instance.
